title: Lucifer
html:
Lucifer

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
& Lucifer
Difficulty 49
Attacks Weapon 2d8 armor shredding, Weapon 2d8 armor shredding, Weapon 2d8 physical, Weapon 2d8 physical, Claw 2d8 Quest Artifact theft, Gaze attack 8d8 random gaze type
& Lucifer
Difficulty 49
Attacks

Weapon 2d8 armor shredding, Weapon 2d8 armor shredding, Weapon 2d8 physical, Weapon 2d8 physical, Claw 2d8 Quest Artifact theft, Gaze attack 8d8 random gaze type

Base level 39
Base experience 1913
Speed 19
Base AC -13
Base MR 99
Alignment 10 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 2000
Nutritional value 0
Size large
Resistances fire, cold, sleep, shock, poison, petrification
Resistances conveyed sleep

Lucifer:

  • can survive underwater.
  • does not breathe.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • has a thick hide.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • has infravision.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • gives out light.
  • may turn against you when tame.
  • cannot be tamed.

Lucifer and Apollyon were both in dNetHack in a prior version, but are no longer used. They are still in the code, however. Lucifer would be generated on Astral if you killed Apollyon.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Lucifer&oldid=156402"

Lucifer and [[Apollyon]] were both in [[dNetHack]] in a prior version, but are no longer used. They are still in the code, however. Lucifer would be generated on Astral if you killed Apollyon.
